Texto: 
leukokoria and mass right eye (od)
enucleation and prosthesis
• 10 by 14mm mass occupying the posterior vitreous of the right eye
• no extension into optic nerve
• mass enhances homogeneously
• no contralateral mass
• no pineal region mass
retinoblastoma
• retinoblastoma
• hematoma
• melanoma
• metastatic disease
8 month old boy referred for mri evaluation of right eye leukokoria.
